stories: Legacy media gets a new valuation anchor: Paramount Skydance agrees to buy WBD for $31/share (all-cash).
US cable consolidation clears a major hurdle: FCC approves Charter’s $34.5B acquisition of Cox assets.
AI funding shockwave: OpenAI reportedly lines up a $110B private round at ~$730B pre-money.
Space/defense sentiment catalyst: SpaceX weighs confidential IPO filing as soon as March (Bloomberg).
Crypto market-structure tell: Morgan Stanley applies for a bank charter to custody crypto (Bloomberg).
Geopolitics premium check: Trump says on Iran talks, “No enrichment, not 20%.”
Private credit stress signal: Apollo’s MFIC cuts dividend, marks down assets, announces $100M buyback.
Positioning edge (EDA/AI tools): Synopsys (SNPS) short interest falls ~5% vs prior report.
Positioning edge (electrification/industrial factor): Eaton (ETN) short interest rises to ~1.98% of float.
AI procurement wildcard: Trump claims he’s directing all federal agencies to stop using Anthropic tech (unverified social buzz).
